title: Why my pixel 5 heats too much and work slow during video call on whatsapp???
content: Everytime when I do video call on my device then after some time it heats like a Radiator and works in a slow motion.Sometimes I feel It can be blast. This thing is disgusting.  Snapdragon 735 , 8GB of RAM in this device and It still heating and working slow (hang) on a video call!!!!! Why?
